readable.content: A brown dog is laying on its back on the grass with a ball in its mouth . A brown dog lies on its back in the grass , holding a ball in its mouth . A brown dog with a tennis ball its mouth rolling on its back on a grassy surface . A dog lays on his back with a favorite tennis ball in his mouth . A tan dog plays with a tennis ball while rolling around in the grass .
